name: Murder Simulator v. 666
description:
Murder Simulator is a competitive local multiplayer game. It features a variety of tactically unique items and weapons including:

  • gravity lifts
  • lava pits
  • sticky mines
  • an arcing grenade launcher which ricochets off of walls
  • the deadly orb gun
  • a powerful beam cannon
  • and last but certainly not least, the pink gun (which makes things pink)

It is ideal for having living room yelling matches with groups of 2-4 friends.

It is also easy to make your own levels for the game. All you need is a paint program. Just draw the level you want and you can play it in the game!
